attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The declassification of cannabis has led to an explosion in the use of this dangerous and addicitve drug. There has been a huge increase in the number of cannabis users requiring treatment for mental illness. The public is at risk from cannabis users who drive whilst under the influence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
